event.description: Marco Scutaro bunt grounds out, catcher Jeff Mathis to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Aaron Hill strikes out swinging.
Alex Rios pops out to shortstop Maicer Izturis.
Vernon Wells doubles (9) on a line drive to center fielder Torii Hunter.

Lyle Overbay flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Rod Barajas strikes out swinging.
